cleaned_text: Image 1 of 3 Image 2 of 3 Image 3 of 3 Crystal & Essential Oil Kits $45.00 Crystals and a handcrafted blend of essential oils to amplify your intentions! Each box come with intuitively picked crystals from my collection, a heart lava stone to put the customized essential oil blend on along with a beautiful gold box and description of your crystals and essential oil blend. Free Shipping in the USA! Want to customize your own kit? Click here All crystals in kits vary in type, size and color, but are generally .75" - 3" - you will receive the type of crystals described but because one of our values are to source as ethically & sustainable as possible - crystals may be polished or raw and vary in look and size.
